DALY infection-burden dataset

Source: R/Data.R
Data.Rd

The dataset contains Disability-Adjusted Life Years (DALYs) per 100,000 for five healthcare-associated infections — HAP, SSI, BSI, UTI, and CDI — across two surveillance studies: German PPS and ECDC PPS (EU/EEA).

Usage

data(Data)

Format

A tibble with 20 rows and 5 variables:

group

Surveillance study: "German PPS" or "ECDC PPS".

category

Infection type: HAP, SSI, BSI, UTI, CDI.

component

DALY component: "YLD" or "YLL".

value

DALYs per 100,000 population.

se

Standard error for the total DALY estimate (for error bars).

Source

Zacher et al. (2019), https://cwd.numbat.space/assignments/assignment-2-papers/Zacher2019.pdf

Details

Each infection’s burden is split into:

  • YLD — Years Lived with Disability

  • YLL — Years of Life Lost
